caption: Table S2: Ablations on each component, evaluating only the middle frame out of all 7 generated frames. "w/o trajectory" denotes inference without guidance from point trajectory, "w/o traj. updating" indicates inference without trajectory updates, and "w/o bi" suggests trajectory updating without bi-directional consistency verification.
description: Table S2 presents ablation study results on different components of the proposed Framer model, focusing on the middle frame of the generated video sequence.
